New Records: Virat Kohli became the highest scorer in a T20 World Cup final with 76 runs
Hardik Pandya bowled a crucial last-over to defend 20 runs
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took a stunning catch to dismiss David Miller
Hardik Pandya hit the winning runs to secure India's victory
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma expressed his pride in the team's resilience
Rahul Dravid highlighted the importance of the win for India's journey
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed gratitude for the opportunity to win the match
Rohit Sharma announced his retirement from T20Is
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a historic win for India, their first since 2007
South Africa's close but unsuccessful chase
